main - package main
 
Main - Class in main
Starts the game by calling a new instance of the GameController.
Main() - Constructor for class main.Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class main.Main
 
mainMenu - package mainMenu
 
MainMenuButtonPanel - Class in mainMenu
Displays the button panel at the bottom of the main menu screen.
MainMenuButtonPanel() - Constructor for class mainMenu.MainMenuButtonPanel
The constructor that creates an MainMenuButtonPanel object of the button panel.
MainMenuImagePanel - Class in mainMenu
Creates the centerPanel for the main menu with an image.
MainMenuImagePanel() - Constructor for class mainMenu.MainMenuImagePanel
Constructor to make a new MainMenuImagePanel object.
mainMenuStartButtonClicked() - Method in class controller.GameController
Called when the main menu start button is clicked from the button panel.
MainMenuTitlePanel - Class in mainMenu
Creates the title of the panel that runs across the top of the screen.
MainMenuTitlePanel(String) - Constructor for class mainMenu.MainMenuTitlePanel
Constructor that sets up the title panel based upon the string title and creates a new MainMenuTitlePanel object.
MainMenuView - Class in mainMenu
Creates the main menu for the game.

Makes a new MainMenuView object for the game.
makeBoardMenu(int, int, int, long, long) - Method in class main.GameView
Makes a new BoardMenuView that initializes the score panel to the player health, score, and money.
makeIntEnemy(int) - Method in class main.Factory
Returns an instance of an enemy corresponding to the passed in string.
makeIntTower(int) - Method in class main.Factory
Returns an instance of a tower corresponding to the passed in int.
makeStringTower(String) - Method in class main.Factory
Returns an instance of a tower corresponding to the passed in string.
makeTutorial(int, int, int, long, long) - Method in class main.GameView
Makes a new TutorialView when the tutorial button is clicked from the main menu view.
modelInit() - Method in class controller.GameController
Initializes the player model in the game by setting each attribute that a player has.
modelInit() - Method in class controller.TutorialGameController
Initializes the player model and will allow the view to update to set this to the different components of the Score Panel and Timer Panel.

Controls what happens when the mouse is clicked on the screen.

mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class tutorial.TutorialView
 
moveEnemy(EnemyModel) - Method in class main.GameModel
Moves the enemy at the given index in this game's enemyList toward the next destination in the path, And, if the enemy reaches the destination, returns true if the enemy falls out of bounds, And returns false, while updating its direction, if it does not
moveToward(Posn) - Method in class main.EnemyModel
Moves this enemy toward its current direction, and returns true if this enemy reaches the given destination and false otherwise.
